channel.title: Countries on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Countries on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Add edit country
item.description: Add edit countryWhen adding or editing a country, the following fields / drop-down / toggles are displayed: Country - This field is mandatory. When trying to save without filling this field, the following error message is displayed: “The field name is required at least in default language.”. When trying to save with more than 64 chars are filled the following error message appears “Your entry in field name (language English (English)) exceeds max length 64 chars (incl.

item.title: Countries listing
item.description: Countries listing Call to actionA call to action button is displayed: Add new country - See the specs of the add edit country Settings wheelWhen clicking on the settings wheel, the following options are displayed: Refresh list After clicking on it, the page is reloaded. Sorts and searches are kept. Show SQL query After clicking on it, the SQL query is displayed in a modal. The SQL query takes into account filters and sorts that have been done.
